TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PerformanceCounterType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定用來計算 執行個體 (Instance) 方法的公式。

span.span: Specifies the formula used to calculate the method for a instance.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 某些計數器型別代表未經處理的資料，而其他項目代表一或多個計數器樣本為基礎的導出的值。Some counter types represent raw data, while others represent calculated values that are based on one or more counter samples. 下列類別分類可用的計數器。The following categories classify the types of counters available. - 平均︰ 測量值經過一段時間，並顯示最後兩個度量的平均值。Average: measure a value over time and display the average of the last two measurements. 每個 」 平均計數器相關聯是基底計數器可追蹤所涉及的樣本數目。Associated with each average counter is a base counter that tracks the number of samples involved. - 差異： 減一次的測量，從上一個，並顯示差異，如果它是正數;如果是負數，它們會顯示一個零。Difference: subtract the last measurement from the previous one and display the difference, if it is positive; if negative, they display a zero. - 即時： 顯示最新的量。Instantaneous: display the most recent measurement. - 百分比： 會顯示成百分比的導出的值。Percentage: display calculated values as a percentage. - 速率： 範例經過一段時間的遞增的事件計數，並除以計數值的變更所顯示的活動率時間的變更。Rate: sample an increasing count of events over time and divide the change in count values by the change in time to display a rate of activity. 當效能計數器資料，使用計數器型別，表示平均取樣可讓原始資料值供您使用有意義。When sampling performance counter data, using a counter type that represents an average can make raw data values meaningful for your use. 例如，未經處理資料計數器`NumberOfItems64`可以公開是相當隨機範例範例的資料。For example, the raw data counter `NumberOfItems64` can expose data that is fairly random from sample to sample. 平均計數器傳回的值計算的公式會 (X 0 + X 1 + X n) / n，其中每個 X 是未經處理計數器樣本。The formula for an average calculation of the values that the counter returns would be (X 0 +X 1 +…+X n)/n, where each X i is a raw counter sample. 速率計數器是類似於平均計數器，但使用的資源時，增加速率的情況下更有用。Rate counters are similar to average counters, but more useful for situations in which the rate increases as a resource is used. 快速計算平均值的公式是 ((X n X 0) / (T n-T 0)) / 頻率，而每個 X 是計數器樣本，而每個 T 是對應樣本的時間。A formula that quickly calculates the average is ((X n -X 0)/(T n -T 0)) / frequency, where each X i is a counter sample and each T i is the time that the corresponding sample was taken. 結果是每秒的平均使用率。The result is the average usage per second. > [!NOTE] > 除非另有說明，基底的時間就會為秒。Unless otherwise indicated, the time base is seconds. 在檢測應用程式 （建立並寫入自訂效能計數器），您可能會使用依賴隨附的基底計數器，可在計算中的效能計數器型別。When instrumenting applications (creating and writing custom performance counters), you might be working with performance counter types that rely on an accompanying base counter that is used in the calculations. 基底計數器必須緊接在其相關聯的計數器應用程式所使用的集合。The base counter must be immediately after its associated counter in the collection your application uses. 下表列出基底計數器型別，以及其對應的效能計數器類型。The following table lists the base counter types with their corresponding performance counter types. |基底計數器型別Base counter type|效能計數器類型Performance counter types| |-----------------------|-------------------------------| |`AverageBase`|`AverageTimer32`

`AverageCount64`| |`CounterMultiBase`|`CounterMultiTimer`

`CounterMultiTimerInverse`

`CounterMultiTimer100Ns`

`CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse`| |`RawBase`|`RawFraction`| |`SampleBase`|`SampleFraction`| ## Examples 下列範例示範數個中的計數器型別列舉型別。The following examples demonstrate several of the counter types in the enumeration. `AverageCount64` [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#1)] `AverageTimer32` [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageTimer32#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageTimer32/CPP/averagetimer32.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageTimer32#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageTimer32/CS/averagetimer32.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageTimer32#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageTimer32/VB/averagetimer32.vb#2)] `ElapsedTime` [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CPP/elapsedtime.cpp#2)] [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.NumberOfItems32#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.NumberOfItems32/CPP/numberofitems32.cpp#1)] [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.NumberOfItems64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.NumberOfItems64/CPP/numberofitems64.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.SampleFraction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.SampleFraction/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.SampleFraction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.SampleFraction/VB/program.vb#1)] `RateOfCountsPerSecond32` [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond/CPP/rateofcountspersecond32.cpp#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond/VB/rateofcountspersecond32.vb#1)] `RateOfCountsPerSecond64` [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond64/CPP/rateofcountspersecond64.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond64/CS/rateofcountspersecond64.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.RateOfCountsPerSecond64/VB/rateofcountspersecond64.vb#1)] `RawFraction` [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.RawFraction#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.RawFraction/CPP/rawfraction.cpp#1)] MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType AverageBase = int32(1073939458)
AverageBase = 1073939458

summary.span: 基底計數器型別，用於計算時間或計數平均，例如 和 。

span.span: A base counter that is used in the calculation of time or count averages, such as and .

summary.span: 儲存計算計數器的分母，以表示「每個作業時間」或「每個作業次數」。

span.span: Stores the denominator for calculating a counter to present "time per operation" or "count per operation".

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType AverageCount64 = int32(1073874176)
AverageCount64 = 1073874176

summary.span: 平均計數器，顯示在作業期間已處理項目的平均數量。

span.span: An average counter that shows how many items are processed, on average, during an operation.

summary.span: 這個型別的計數器會顯示已處理項目對已完成作業數量的比例。

span.span: Counters of this type display a ratio of the items processed to the number of operations completed.

summary.span: 藉由比較最新間隔期間所處理的項目數量與最新間隔期間所完成的作業，可以計算比例

span.span: The ratio is calculated by comparing the number of items processed during the last interval to the number of operations completed during the last interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (N 1-N 0) / (B 1-B 0)，其中 N 1 和 N 0 效能計數器的讀數，而在 B 1 和 0 B 及其對應`AverageBase`值。Formula: (N 1 -N 0)/(B 1 -B 0), where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings, and the B 1 and B 0 are their corresponding `AverageBase` values. 因此，分子表示在取樣間隔時間期間處理的項目數量，所以分母代表在取樣間隔期間完成的作業數目。Thus, the numerator represents the numbers of items processed during the sample interval, and the denominator represents the number of operations completed during the sample interval. 這個型別的計數器包含 PhysicalDisk\ avg.磁碟位元組/傳送。Counters of this type include PhysicalDisk\ Avg. Disk Bytes/Transfer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType AverageTimer32 = int32(805438464)
AverageTimer32 = 805438464

summary.span: 平均計數器，測量完成處理序或作業的平均使用時間。

span.span: An average counter that measures the time it takes, on average, to complete a process or operation.

summary.span: 這個型別的計數器會顯示樣本間隔的總耗用時間與此期間所完成處理序或作業數量的比例。

span.span: Counters of this type display a ratio of the total elapsed time of the sample interval to the number of processes or operations completed during that time.

summary.span: 這個計數器型別會以系統時鐘的刻度為單位來測量時間

span.span: This counter type measures time in ticks of the system clock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: ((N 1-N 0) /F) / (B 1-B 0)，B 1 和 0 B N 1 和 N 0 為效能計數器的讀數時，為其對應`AverageBase`值和 F 是刻度秒數。Formula: ((N 1 -N 0)/F)/(B 1 -B 0), where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings, B 1 and B 0 are their corresponding `AverageBase` values, and F is the number of ticks per second. F 值納入方程式，以便可以顯示結果，以秒為單位。The value of F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds. 因此，分子表示上一個取樣間隔期間的刻度計數的數字 F 代表刻度的頻率，所以分母代表在上一個取樣間隔期間完成的作業數目。Thus, the numerator represents the numbers of ticks counted during the last sample interval, F represents the frequency of the ticks, and the denominator represents the number of operations completed during the last sample interval. 這個型別的計數器包含 PhysicalDisk\ avg.Disk sec/Transfer。Counters of this type include PhysicalDisk\ Avg. Disk sec/Transfer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterDelta32 = int32(4195328)
CounterDelta32 = 4195328

summary.span: 差異計數器，顯示在最近兩次的樣本間隔間的測量屬性之變更。

span.span: A difference counter that shows the change in the measured attribute between the two most recent sample intervals.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式： N 1-N 0，其中 N 1 和 N 0 是 效能計數器的讀數。Formula: N 1 -N 0, where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterDelta64 = int32(4195584)
CounterDelta64 = 4195584

summary.span: 差異計數器，顯示在最近兩次的樣本間隔間的測量屬性之變更。

span.span: A difference counter that shows the change in the measured attribute between the two most recent sample intervals.

summary.span: 它和 計數器型別相同，但是它使用較大的欄位來容納較大的值。

span.span: It is the same as the counter type except that is uses larger fields to accomodate larger values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式： N 1-N 0，其中 N 1 和 N 0 是 效能計數器的讀數。Formula: N 1 -N 0, where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiBase = int32(1107494144)
CounterMultiBase = 1107494144

summary.span: 基底計數器，表示取樣的項目數量。

span.span: A base counter that indicates the number of items sampled.

summary.span: 當要取得多個類似項目的時間時，它會做為計算的分母來取得取樣項目的平均。

span.span: It is used as the denominator in the calculations to get an average among the items sampled when taking timings of multiple, but similar items.

summary.span: 與 、、 和 一起使用。

span.span: Used with , , , and .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiTimer = int32(574686464)
CounterMultiTimer = 574686464

summary.span: 百分比計數器，將一個或多個元件的作用時間顯示為樣本間隔的總時間百分比。

span.span: A percentage counter that displays the active time of one or more components as a percentage of the total time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 因為分子會記錄同時運作的元件的作用時間，所以產生的百分比可以超過 100 %。

span.span: Because the numerator records the active time of components operating simultaneously, the resulting percentage can exceed 100 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此計數器是多重計時器。This counter is a multitimer. 多重計時器會從一個以上的元件執行個體收集資料，例如處理器或磁碟。Multitimers collect data from more than one instance of a component, such as a processor or disk. 這個計數器型別不同於 `CounterMultiTimer100Ns`，因為它是以系統效能計時器的刻度為單位來測量時間，而不是以 100 奈秒 (Nanosecond) 為單位 This counter type differs from `CounterMultiTimer100Ns` in that it measures time in units of ticks of the system performance timer, rather than in 100 nanosecond units. 公式: ((N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0)) x 100 B，其中 N 1 和 N 0 為效能計數器的讀數 D 1 和 D 0 是系統效能計時器的刻度為單位，其對應的時間讀數，B 變數代表受監視元件的基底的計數 （使用 bas型別的 e 計數器`CounterMultiBase`)。Formula: ((N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0)) x 100 / B, where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings, D 1 and D 0 are their corresponding time readings in ticks of the system performance timer, and the variable B denotes the base count for the monitored components (using a base counter of type `CounterMultiBase`). 因此，分子代表範例並的間隔期間監視的元件是作用中，所以分母代表總經過時間的取樣間隔時間的部分。Thus, the numerator represents the portions of the sample interval during which the monitored components were active, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiTimer100Ns = int32(575735040)
CounterMultiTimer100Ns = 575735040

summary.span: 將一或多個元件的作用時間顯示為樣本間隔的總時間百分比的百分比計數器。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the active time of one or more components as a percentage of the total time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 它會以 100 奈秒為單位來測量時間。

span.span: It measures time in 100 nanosecond (ns) units.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個計數器型別是多重計時器。This counter type is a multitimer. 多重計時器是設計來監視一個以上的元件執行個體，例如處理器或磁碟 Multitimers are designed to monitor more than one instance of a component, such as a processor or disk. 公式: ((N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0)) x 100 B，其中 N 1 和 N 0 為效能計數器的讀數 D 1 和 D 0 是以 100 奈秒為單位，其對應的時間讀數，B 變數代表受監視元件的基底的計數 （使用型別的基底計數器 `CounterMultiBase`).Formula: ((N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0)) x 100 / B, where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings, D 1 and D 0 are their corresponding time readings in 100-nanosecond units, and the variable B denotes the base count for the monitored components (using a base counter of type `CounterMultiBase`). 因此，分子代表範例並的間隔期間監視的元件是作用中，所以分母代表總經過時間的取樣間隔時間的部分。Thus, the numerator represents the portions of the sample interval during which the monitored components were active, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse = int32(592512256)
CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse = 592512256

summary.span: 將一或多個元件的作用時間顯示為樣本間隔的總時間百分比的百分比計數器。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the active time of one or more components as a percentage of the total time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 這個型別的計數器會以 100 奈秒 (ns) 為單位來測量時間。

span.span: Counters of this type measure time in 100 nanosecond (ns) units.

summary.span: 它們會藉由測量元件的非作用時間，並將 100 % 乘以監視物件數量的乘積減去非作用時間，來取得作用的時間。

span.span: They derive the active time by measuring the time that the components were not active and subtracting the result from multiplying 100 percent by the number of objects monitored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個計數器型別是反向多重計時器。This counter type is an inverse multitimer. 多重計時器是設計來監視一個以上的元件執行個體，例如處理器或磁碟 Multitimers are designed to monitor more than one instance of a component, such as a processor or disk. 反向計數器會測量元件處於非使用中的時間，並利用測得的閒置時間推算其作用時間Inverse counters measure the time that a component is not active and derive its active time from the measurement of inactive time 公式: (B-((N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0))) x 100，所以分母代表總經過時間的取樣間隔時間，分子代表的時間間隔期間監視的元件的非使用狀態和 B 代表正在 m 的元件數目onitored，使用基底計數器型別的`CounterMultiBase`。Formula: (B - ((N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0))) x 100, where the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval, the numerator represents the time during the interval when monitored components were inactive, and B represents the number of components being monitored, using a base counter of type `CounterMultiBase`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterMultiTimerInverse = int32(591463680)
CounterMultiTimerInverse = 591463680

summary.span: 將一或多個元件的作用時間顯示為樣本間隔的總時間百分比的百分比計數器。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the active time of one or more components as a percentage of the total time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 它會藉由測量元件非作用時間，並將 100 % 乘以所監視物件數量的乘積減去非作用時間，來取得作用的時間。

span.span: It derives the active time by measuring the time that the components were not active and subtracting the result from 100 percent by the number of objects monitored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個計數器型別是反向多重計時器。This counter type is an inverse multitimer. 多重計時器會監視一個以上的元件執行個體，例如處理器或磁碟。Multitimers monitor more than one instance of a component, such as a processor or disk. 反向計數器會測量元件處於非使用中的時間，並利用該測量推算其作用的時間。Inverse counters measure the time that a component is not active and derive its active time from that measurement. 這個計數器不同於 `CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse`，因為它是以系統效能計時器的刻度為單位來測量時間，而不是以 100 奈秒為單位 This counter differs from `CounterMultiTimer100NsInverse` in that it measures time in units of ticks of the system performance timer, rather than in 100 nanosecond units. 公式: (B-((N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0))) x 100，所以分母代表總經過時間的取樣間隔時間，分子代表的時間間隔期間監視的元件的非使用狀態和 B 代表的元件數目正在監視使用基底計數器型別的`CounterMultiBase`。Formula: (B- ((N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0))) x 100, where the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval, the numerator represents the time during the interval when monitored components were inactive, and B represents the number of components being monitored, using a base counter of type `CounterMultiBase`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterTimer = int32(541132032)
CounterTimer = 541132032

summary.span: 百分比計數器，將元件使用中的平均時間顯示為總耗用時間的百分比。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the average time that a component is active as a percentage of the total sample time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0)，其中 N 1 和 N 0 為效能計數器的讀數，以及 D 1 和 D 0 為其對應的時間讀數。Formula: (N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0), where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings, and D 1 and D 0 are their corresponding time readings. 因此，分子代表範例並的間隔期間監視的元件是作用中，所以分母代表總經過時間的取樣間隔時間的部分。Thus, the numerator represents the portions of the sample interval during which the monitored components were active, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CounterTimerInverse = int32(557909248)
CounterTimerInverse = 557909248

summary.span: 百分比計數器，顯示樣本間隔期間所觀察的作用時間之平均百分比。

span.span: A percentage counter that displays the average percentage of active time observed during sample interval.

summary.span: 這些計數器的值是由監視服務非作用時間百分比，並且將 100 % 減去該百分比所計算而來。

span.span: The value of these counters is calculated by monitoring the percentage of time that the service was inactive and then subtracting that value from 100 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是反向計數器型別。This is an inverse counter type. 反向計數器測量的時間元件，請注意 作用中，並從測量值推算其作用時間。Inverse counters measure the time that a component is note active and derive the active time from that measurement. 此計數器型別是相同`CounterTimer100NsInv`不同之處在於它會測量系統效能計時器的刻度為單位，而不是以 100 奈秒為單位的時間。This counter type is the same as `CounterTimer100NsInv` except that it measures time in units of ticks of the system performance timer rather than in 100 nanosecond units. 公式: (1-((N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0))) x 100，其中分子代表的時間間隔期間當受監視的元件的非使用狀態，所以分母代表總經過時間的取樣間隔時間。Formula: (1- ((N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0))) x 100, where the numerator represents the time during the interval when the monitored components were inactive, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CountPerTimeInterval32 = int32(4523008)
CountPerTimeInterval32 = 4523008

summary.span: 平均計數器，設計來監視一段時間內資源的佇列平均長度。

span.span: An average counter designed to monitor the average length of a queue to a resource over time.

summary.span: 它會顯示在最新的兩個樣本間隔期間，所觀察佇列長度之間的差異值，再除以間隔的持續時間。

span.span: It shows the difference between the queue lengths observed during the last two sample intervals divided by the duration of the interval.

summary.span: 這個計數器型別通常用於追蹤佇列或等候的項目數。

span.span: This type of counter is typically used to track the number of items that are queued or waiting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0)，其中分子表示佇列中的項目數，所以分母代表時間在上一個取樣間隔期間的耗用。Formula: (N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0), where the numerator represents the number of items in the queue and the denominator represents the time elapsed during the last sample interval.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType CountPerTimeInterval64 = int32(4523264)
CountPerTimeInterval64 = 4523264

summary.span: 平均計數器，監視一段時間內資源的佇列平均長度。

span.span: An average counter that monitors the average length of a queue to a resource over time.

summary.span: 這個型別的計數器會顯示在最新的兩個樣本間隔期間，所觀察佇列長度之間的差異值，再除以間隔的持續時間。

span.span: Counters of this type display the difference between the queue lengths observed during the last two sample intervals, divided by the duration of the interval.

summary.span: 這個計數器型別和 相同，但是它使用較大的欄位來容納較大的值。

span.span: This counter type is the same as except that it uses larger fields to accommodate larger values.

summary.span: 這個計數器型別通常用於追蹤大量佇列或等候的項目數。

span.span: This type of counter is typically used to track a high-volume or very large number of items that are queued or waiting.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0)，其中分子表示佇列中的項目數，所以分母代表時間耗用取樣間隔期間。Formula: (N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0), where the numerator represents the number of items in a queue and the denominator represents the time elapsed during the sample interval.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType ElapsedTime = int32(807666944)
ElapsedTime = 807666944

summary.span: 差異計時器，顯示元件或處理序啟動時間和計算這個值的時間之間的總時間。

span.span: A difference timer that shows the total time between when the component or process started and the time when this value is calculated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (D 0-N 0) / F，其中 D 0 代表目前的時間，N 0 表示的時間啟動的物件，而 F 代表每秒的時間單位的數目。Formula: (D 0 - N 0) / F, where D 0 represents the current time, N 0 represents the time the object was started, and F represents the number of time units that elapse in one second. F 值納入方程式，以便可以顯示結果，以秒為單位。The value of F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds. 這個型別的計數器包含系統系統運作時間。Counters of this type include System\ System Up Time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType NumberOfItems32 = int32(65536)
NumberOfItems32 = 65536

summary.span: 顯示最近觀察到的值的即時計數器。

span.span: An instantaneous counter that shows the most recently observed value.

summary.span: 例如，用來維護項目或作業的簡單計數。

span.span: Used, for example, to maintain a simple count of items or operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式： 無。Formula: None. 不會顯示平均值，但會在收集時，顯示未經處理的資料。Does not display an average, but shows the raw data as it is collected. 這個型別的計數器包含 Memory\Available 位元組。Counters of this type include Memory\Available Bytes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType NumberOfItems64 = int32(65792)
NumberOfItems64 = 65792

summary.span: 顯示最近觀察到的值的即時計數器。

span.span: An instantaneous counter that shows the most recently observed value.

summary.span: 例如，用來維護極大量項目或作業的簡單計數。

span.span: Used, for example, to maintain a simple count of a very large number of items or operations.

summary.span: 它和 相同，但是它使用較大的欄位來容納較大的值。

span.span: It is the same as except that it uses larger fields to accommodate larger values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式： 無。Formula: None. 不會顯示平均值，但會在收集時，顯示未經處理的資料。Does not display an average, but shows the raw data as it is collected.

NumberOfItemsHEX32 = 0

summary.span: 即時計數器，以十六進位格式顯示最近觀察到的值。

span.span: An instantaneous counter that shows the most recently observed value in hexadecimal format.

summary.span: 例如，用來維護項目或作業的簡單計數。

span.span: Used, for example, to maintain a simple count of items or operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式： 無。Formula: None. 不會顯示平均值，但會在收集時，顯示未經處理的資料。Does not display an average, but shows the raw data as it is collected.

NumberOfItemsHEX64 = 256

summary.span: 顯示最近觀察到的值的即時計數器。

span.span: An instantaneous counter that shows the most recently observed value.

summary.span: 例如，用來維護極大量項目或作業的簡單計數。

span.span: Used, for example, to maintain a simple count of a very large number of items or operations.

summary.span: 它和 相同，但是它使用較大的欄位來容納較大的值。

span.span: It is the same as except that it uses larger fields to accommodate larger values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式： 無。Formula: None. 不會顯示平均值，但會在收集時，顯示未經處理資料Does not display an average, but shows the raw data as it is collected

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType RateOfCountsPerSecond32 = int32(272696320)
RateOfCountsPerSecond32 = 272696320

summary.span: 差異計數器，顯示在樣本間隔每秒期間完成的作業平均數。

span.span: A difference counter that shows the average number of operations completed during each second of the sample interval.

summary.span: 這個型別的計數器會以系統時鐘的刻度為單位來測量時間

span.span: Counters of this type measure time in ticks of the system clock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (N 1-N 0) / ((D 1-D 0) / F)，其中 N 1 和 N 0 為效能計數器的讀數、 D 1 和 D 0 為其對應的時間讀數，而 F 代表每秒的刻度數。Formula: (N 1 - N 0) / ((D 1 -D 0) / F), where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings, D 1 and D 0 are their corresponding time readings, and F represents the number of ticks per second. 因此，分子表示上一個取樣間隔的刻度數共歷時上一個取樣間隔，分母代表在執行的作業數目，而 F 是刻度的頻率。Thus, the numerator represents the number of operations performed during the last sample interval, the denominator represents the number of ticks elapsed during the last sample interval, and F is the frequency of the ticks. F 值納入方程式，以便可以顯示結果，以秒為單位。The value of F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds. 這個型別的計數器包含系統檔案讀取作業數/秒。Counters of this type include System\ File Read Operations/sec.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType RateOfCountsPerSecond64 = int32(272696576)
RateOfCountsPerSecond64 = 272696576

summary.span: 差異計數器，顯示在樣本間隔每秒期間完成的作業平均數。

span.span: A difference counter that shows the average number of operations completed during each second of the sample interval.

summary.span: 這個型別的計數器會以系統時鐘的刻度為單位來測量時間

span.span: Counters of this type measure time in ticks of the system clock.

summary.span: 這個計數器型別和 型別相同，但是它使用較大的欄位來容納較大的值，以便追蹤每秒大量的項目數或作業數，例如位元組傳輸速率。

span.span: This counter type is the same as the type, but it uses larger fields to accommodate larger values to track a high-volume number of items or operations per second, such as a byte-transmission rate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (N 1-N 0) / ((D 1-D 0) / F)，其中 N 1 和 N 0 為效能計數器的讀數、 D 1 和 D 0 為其對應的時間讀數，而 F 代表每秒的刻度數。Formula: (N 1 - N 0) / ((D 1 -D 0) / F), where N 1 and N 0 are performance counter readings, D 1 and D 0 are their corresponding time readings, and F represents the number of ticks per second. 因此，分子表示上一個取樣間隔的刻度數共歷時上一個取樣間隔，分母代表在執行的作業數目，而 F 是刻度的頻率。Thus, the numerator represents the number of operations performed during the last sample interval, the denominator represents the number of ticks elapsed during the last sample interval, and F is the frequency of the ticks. F 值納入方程式，以便可以顯示結果，以秒為單位。The value of F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds. 這個型別的計數器包含系統檔案讀取位元組/秒。Counters of this type include System\ File Read Bytes/sec.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType RawBase = int32(1073939459)

summary.span: 基底計數器，儲存表示一般算術分數的計數器的分母。

span.span: A base counter that stores the denominator of a counter that presents a general arithmetic fraction.

summary.span: 請在將這個值當做 值計算中的分母之前，先檢查這個值是否大於零。

span.span: Check that this value is greater than zero before using it as the denominator in a value calculation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType RawFraction = int32(537003008)
RawFraction = 537003008

summary.span: 即時百分比計數器，以百分比顯示子集對其集合的比例。

span.span: An instantaneous percentage counter that shows the ratio of a subset to its set as a percentage.

summary.span: 例如，它會比較磁碟的使用中位元組數和磁碟的總位元組數。

span.span: For example, it compares the number of bytes in use on a disk to the total number of bytes on the disk.

summary.span: 這個型別的計數器只會顯示目前的百分比，而不是一段時間的平均

span.span: Counters of this type display the current percentage only, not an average over time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (0 N / D 0) x 100，其中 D 0 代表測量的屬性 (使用基底計數器型別`RawBase`) 和 N 0 代表該屬性的一個元件。Formula: (N 0 / D 0) x 100, where D 0 represents a measured attribute (using a base counter of type `RawBase`) and N 0 represents one component of that attribute. 這個型別的計數器包含分頁檔\\%使用率正達尖峰。Counters of this type include Paging File\\% Usage Peak.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType SampleBase = int32(1073939457)
SampleBase = 1073939457

summary.span: 基底計數器型別，儲存取樣中斷數，並在取樣分數中做為分母。

span.span: A base counter that stores the number of sampling interrupts taken and is used as a denominator in the sampling fraction.

summary.span: 取樣分數就是樣本數目，其對樣本中斷而言為 1 (或 )。

span.span: The sampling fraction is the number of samples that were 1 (or ) for a sample interrupt.

summary.span: 在將這個值當做 計算中的分母之前，請先檢查這個值是否大於零。

span.span: Check that this value is greater than zero before using it as the denominator in a calculation of .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType SampleCounter = int32(4260864)
SampleCounter = 4260864

summary.span: 平均計數器，顯示一秒鐘完成的作業平均數。

span.span: An average counter that shows the average number of operations completed in one second.

summary.span: 當這個型別的計數器取樣資料時，每個取樣中斷會傳回 1 或 0。

span.span: When a counter of this type samples the data, each sampling interrupt returns one or zero.

summary.span: 計數器資料是所取樣的數目。

span.span: The counter data is the number of ones that were sampled.

summary.span: 它會以系統效能計時器的刻度為單位來測量時間。

span.span: It measures time in units of ticks of the system performance timer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (N 1-N 0) / ((D 1-D 0) / F)，其中分子 (N) 表示已完成的作業數目，分母 (D) 表示的系統效能計時器的刻度為單位的經過時間，F 代表每秒的刻度數。Formula: (N 1 – N 0) / ((D 1 – D 0) / F), where the numerator (N) represents the number of operations completed, the denominator (D) represents elapsed time in units of ticks of the system performance timer, and F represents the number of ticks that elapse in one second. F 納入方程式，以便可以顯示結果，以秒為單位。F is factored into the equation so that the result can be displayed in seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType SampleFraction = int32(549585920)
SampleFraction = 549585920

summary.span: 百分比計數器，顯示在最新兩次樣本間隔期間的對所有作業點擊的平均比例。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the average ratio of hits to all operations during the last two sample intervals.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: ((N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0)) x 100，分子在上一個取樣間隔，表示成功的作業數目，所以分母代表範例期間所完成之所有作業數目 （測量的型別） 的變更使用型別的計數器的間隔`SampleBase`。Formula: ((N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0)) x 100, where the numerator represents the number of successful operations during the last sample interval, and the denominator represents the change in the number of all operations (of the type measured) completed during the sample interval, using counters of type `SampleBase`. 這個型別的計數器包含 Cache\Pin 讀取點擊 %。Counters of this type include Cache\Pin Read Hits %.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType Timer100Ns = int32(542180608)

summary.span: 將一或多個元件的作用時間顯示為樣本間隔的總時間百分比的百分比計數器。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the active time of a component as a percentage of the total elapsed time of the sample interval.

summary.span: 它會以 100 奈秒為單位來測量時間。

span.span: It measures time in units of 100 nanoseconds (ns).

summary.span: 這個型別的計數器是設計來一次測量一個元件的活動

span.span: Counters of this type are designed to measure the activity of one component at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式: (N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0) x 100，其中分子表示取樣間隔期間監視的元件是作用中的部分，所以分母代表總經過時間的取樣間隔時間。Formula: (N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0) x 100, where the numerator represents the portions of the sample interval during which the monitored components were active, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval. 這個型別的計數器包含 Processor\ %User Time。Counters of this type include Processor\ % User Time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounterType Timer100NsInverse = int32(558957824)
Timer100NsInverse = 558957824

summary.span: 百分比計數器，顯示樣本間隔期間所觀察的作用時間之平均百分比。

span.span: A percentage counter that shows the average percentage of active time observed during the sample interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是反向計數器。This is an inverse counter. 這個型別的計數器會計算作用中的時間是測量服務非作用時間，然後再減去 100%的作用中時間的百分比。Counters of this type calculate active time by measuring the time that the service was inactive and then subtracting the percentage of active time from 100 percent. 公式: (1-((N 1-N 0) / (D 1-D 0))) x 100，其中分子代表的時間間隔期間當受監視的元件的非使用狀態，所以分母代表總經過時間的取樣間隔時間。Formula: (1- ((N 1 - N 0) / (D 1 - D 0))) x 100, where the numerator represents the time during the interval when the monitored components were inactive, and the denominator represents the total elapsed time of the sample interval. 這個型別的計數器包含 Processor\ %Processor Time。Counters of this type include Processor\ % Processor Time.
